name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your taunt abilities activate the module's refracting energy, protecting you from 50% of damage taken, up to 2.6 million. This may only occur once every 1 min.

name: Turbo-Drain 5000

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 152,932 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!
